TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: You enjoy them until the radiation sickness takes you.

I wish for a universal coin.

Granted. You get a universal penny

 

I wish for ksp2 to not have been cancelled

Granted, it isn't. It's 2048, and the people are still waiting for it.
 

4 hours ago, ColdJ said:

I wish for a universal coin.

Granted, too. Since the Earth occupation by the Intergalactic Council of the Universe, all underdeveloped races of the Universe must use the Universal Penny to track their payments.


I wish for liquid money in flasks and bottles.

Some rich guy breaks in your house, steals your liquid money reserves and drinks it all.

I wish for ideas.

Granted: Some ikea flat packs.

I wish the LEGO guy came back.

Granted, he became a minifig during his inactivity.

I wish for a brainstorm

Granted, a thunderstorm is now stuck inside your brain.

I wish maths made sense.

Granted, now nearly everyone understands advanced math; everyone except you.

I wish for a wish.

Edited July 15 by Kerb24

The wish expends itself right away, meaning you don't get any wishes.

I wish fridges ran.

Granted, they run away from you, and can't keep stuff cold anymore

I wish that Blackrack's Volumetric Clouds were free.

Granted: They are free if you pay for a subscription to Paetreon.

I wish I had said clouds already in my game.

Granted. You join the Minetest developers.

I wish for all Minetest mods combined together.

Granted: They become a grotesque body with multiple arms, legs and other things.

I wish that the word "mod" didn't cover 3 different possibilities.

Granted. To avoid confusion, all the mods turn into mods and there are only two possibilities.

I wish for my wish to be horribly corrupted.

Granted: You get horribly corrupted and go in to politics.

I wish for funky music.

Granted. You download bomfunk_freestyler.mp3

I wish the rap music was never invented.

Granted: You get classical music on Saturdays and poetry recitals on Sundays.

I wish for better understanding.
